data.similar:
POE::Component::Server:TCP - this one builds servers, mine builds
    proxies.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
POE::Component::Client::TCP and POE::Component::Server:TCP exist.
    POE::Component:Proxy::TCP fits pattern, and is used in much the same
    way as the server and client component, but to build proxies (acts
    as server on one side, client on other).
